content: 1 Simon Peter､ servant and apostle of Jesus Christ Unto them who have obtained equally precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God､ and Saviour Jesus Christ
content_old: 1 Simon Peter､ servant and apostle of Jesus Christ Unto them who have obtained equally precious faith with us in the righteousness of our God､ and Saviour Jesus Christ

content: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace be multiplied, In the personal knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord;—
content_old: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace be multiplied, In the personal knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord;—

content: 3 As all things suited for life and godliness his divine power unto us hath given, Through the personal knowledge of him that hath called us through glory and excellence,—
content_old: 3 As all things suited for life and godliness his divine power unto us hath given, Through the personal knowledge of him that hath called us through glory and excellence,—

content: 4 Through which his precious and very great promises have unto us been given, In order that through these ye might become sharers in a divine nature— Escaping the corruption that is in the world by coveting.
content_old: 4 Through which his precious and very great promises have unto us been given, In order that through these ye might become sharers in a divine nature— Escaping the corruption that is in the world by coveting.

content: 5 And for this very reason also— Adding､ on your part､ all diligence Supply in your faith excellence､ And in your excellence knowledge､
content_old: 5 And for this very reason also— Adding､ on your part､ all diligence Supply in your faith excellence､ And in your excellence knowledge､

content: 6 And in your knowledge self-control､ And in your self-control endurance､ And in your endurance godliness､
content_old: 6 And in your knowledge self-control､ And in your self-control endurance､ And in your endurance godliness､

content: 7 And in your godliness brotherly affection､ And in your brotherly affection love.
content_old: 7 And in your godliness brotherly affection､ And in your brotherly affection love.

content: 8 These things unto you belonging and abounding Neither idle nor unfruitful constitute you､ regarding the personal knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ;
content_old: 8 These things unto you belonging and abounding Neither idle nor unfruitful constitute you､ regarding the personal knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ;

content: 9 For he to whom these things are not present is blind､ seeing only what is near, Having come to forget his purification from his old sins.
content_old: 9 For he to whom these things are not present is blind､ seeing only what is near, Having come to forget his purification from his old sins.

content: 10 Wherefore all the more brethren､ give diligence to be making firm your calling and election; For these things doing､ in nowise shall ye stumble at any time,
content_old: 10 Wherefore all the more brethren､ give diligence to be making firm your calling and election; For these things doing､ in nowise shall ye stumble at any time,

content: 11 For thus shall richly be further supplied unto you—the entrance into the age-abiding kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
content_old: 11 For thus shall richly be further supplied unto you—the entrance into the age-abiding kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.

content: 12 Wherefore､ I shall be certain to be always putting you in remembrance concerning these things,— Although､ indeed､ ye know them, and have become confirmed in the present truth;
content_old: 12 Wherefore､ I shall be certain to be always putting you in remembrance concerning these things,— Although､ indeed､ ye know them, and have become confirmed in the present truth;

content: 13 Right nevertheless､ I account it— As long as I am in this tent to be stirring you up by putting you in remembrance,
content_old: 13 Right nevertheless､ I account it— As long as I am in this tent to be stirring you up by putting you in remembrance,

content: 14 Knowing that speedy is the putting off of my tent— Even as our Lord Jesus Christ also made clear to me:
content_old: 14 Knowing that speedy is the putting off of my tent— Even as our Lord Jesus Christ also made clear to me:

content: 15 Yea､ I will give diligence also､ that at every time ye may be able after my own departure to be keeping up the remembrance of these very things.
content_old: 15 Yea､ I will give diligence also､ that at every time ye may be able after my own departure to be keeping up the remembrance of these very things.

content: 16 For not as having followed cleverly devised stories made we known unto you the power and presence of our Lord Jesus Christ, But as having been made spectators of his majesty.
content_old: 16 For not as having followed cleverly devised stories made we known unto you the power and presence of our Lord Jesus Christ, But as having been made spectators of his majesty.

content: 17 For when he received from God the Father honour and glory, A voice being borne to him such as this､ by the magnificent glory— My Son､ the beloved is this, in whom I delight
content_old: 17 For when he received from God the Father honour and glory, A voice being borne to him such as this､ by the magnificent glory— My Son､ the beloved is this, in whom I delight

content: 18 Even this voice we heard､ when out of heaven it was borne, We being with him in the holy mount.
content_old: 18 Even this voice we heard､ when out of heaven it was borne, We being with him in the holy mount.

content: 19 And we have more firm the prophetic word;— Whereunto ye are doing well to take heed,— As unto a lamp shining in a dusky place,— Until day shall dawn､ and a day-star shall arise in your hearts:—
content_old: 19 And we have more firm the prophetic word;— Whereunto ye are doing well to take heed,— As unto a lamp shining in a dusky place,— Until day shall dawn､ and a day-star shall arise in your hearts:—

content: 20 Of this first taking note— That no prophecy of scripture becometh self-solving;
content_old: 20 Of this first taking note— That no prophecy of scripture becometh self-solving;

content: 1 But there arose false-prophets also among the people, As among you also there shall be false-teachers,— Men who will stealthily bring in destructive parties, Even the Master that bought them denying､ Bringing upon themselves speedy destruction;
content_old: 1 But there arose false-prophets also among the people, As among you also there shall be false-teachers,— Men who will stealthily bring in destructive parties, Even the Master that bought them denying､ Bringing upon themselves speedy destruction;

content: 2 And many will follow out their wanton ways,— By reason of whom the way of truth will be defamed,
content_old: 2 And many will follow out their wanton ways,— By reason of whom the way of truth will be defamed,

content: 3 And in greed､ with forged words will they of you make merchandise: For whom the sentence from of old is not idle, And their destruction doth not slumber.
content_old: 3 And in greed､ with forged words will they of you make merchandise: For whom the sentence from of old is not idle, And their destruction doth not slumber.

content: 4 For—if God spared not messengers､ when they sinned､ But to pits of gloom consigning them､ in the lowest hades delivered them up to be kept unto judgment,—
content_old: 4 For—if God spared not messengers､ when they sinned､ But to pits of gloom consigning them､ in the lowest hades delivered them up to be kept unto judgment,—

content: 5 And an ancient world spared not, But with seven others preserved Noah a proclaimer of righteousness, A flood､ upon a world of ungodly persons letting loose,—
content_old: 5 And an ancient world spared not, But with seven others preserved Noah a proclaimer of righteousness, A flood､ upon a world of ungodly persons letting loose,—

content: 6 And the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah reducing to ashes､ he condemned, An example of such as should be ungodly having set forth,—
content_old: 6 And the cities of Sodom and Gomorrah reducing to ashes､ he condemned, An example of such as should be ungodly having set forth,—

content: 7 And righteous Lot､ when getting worn out by the behaviour of them who were impious in wantonness he rescued—
content_old: 7 And righteous Lot､ when getting worn out by the behaviour of them who were impious in wantonness he rescued—

content: 8 For in seeing and hearing､ since he dwelt right among them､ as a righteous man he used to torment his soul､ day by day､ with their lawless deeds—
content_old: 8 For in seeing and hearing､ since he dwelt right among them､ as a righteous man he used to torment his soul､ day by day､ with their lawless deeds—

content: 9 Then the Lord knoweth how to rescue the godly out of trial; But to keep the unrighteous unto a day of judgment to be punished;—
content_old: 9 Then the Lord knoweth how to rescue the godly out of trial; But to keep the unrighteous unto a day of judgment to be punished;—

content: 10 Most of all however､ them who go their way after the flesh､ with a coveting of defilement and who despise lordship,— Daring! wilful! Before dignitaries they tremble not, Defaming､
content_old: 10 Most of all however､ them who go their way after the flesh､ with a coveting of defilement and who despise lordship,— Daring! wilful! Before dignitaries they tremble not, Defaming､

content: 11 where messengers though greater in might and power are not bringing against them before the Lord a defamatory accusation,—
content_old: 11 where messengers though greater in might and power are not bringing against them before the Lord a defamatory accusation,—

content: 12 These however､ As unreasoning creatures that have been bred as being by nature for capture and destruction In the things they are ignorant of uttering defamation, In their spoiling shall also be made a spoil,—
content_old: 12 These however､ As unreasoning creatures that have been bred as being by nature for capture and destruction In the things they are ignorant of uttering defamation, In their spoiling shall also be made a spoil,—

content: 13 Doing wrong themselves､ for a reward of wrong, Accounting a delight their day-time delicacy, Spots and blemishes､ indulging in delicacies with their stratagems､ as they carouse together with you,
content_old: 13 Doing wrong themselves､ for a reward of wrong, Accounting a delight their day-time delicacy, Spots and blemishes､ indulging in delicacies with their stratagems､ as they carouse together with you,

content: 14 Having eyes full of an adulteress､ and that cannot rest from sin, Enticing unstable souls, Having a heart trained in greed,— Children of a curse,—
content_old: 14 Having eyes full of an adulteress､ and that cannot rest from sin, Enticing unstable souls, Having a heart trained in greed,— Children of a curse,—

content: 15 Forsaking a straight path､ they have gone astray, Following out the way of Balaam son of Beor､ Who loved a reward of wrong,
content_old: 15 Forsaking a straight path､ they have gone astray, Following out the way of Balaam son of Beor､ Who loved a reward of wrong,

content: 16 But had a reproof of his own transgression, A dumb beast of burden in man’s voice finding utterance forbade the prophet’s madness.
content_old: 16 But had a reproof of his own transgression, A dumb beast of burden in man’s voice finding utterance forbade the prophet’s madness.

content: 17 These are fountains without water､ And mists by a tempest driven along,— For whom the gloom of darkness hath been reserved;
content_old: 17 These are fountains without water､ And mists by a tempest driven along,— For whom the gloom of darkness hath been reserved;

content: 18 For great swelling words of vanity uttering､ they entice with carnal covetings—in wanton ways—them who are well-nigh escaping from the men who in error have their behaviour;
content_old: 18 For great swelling words of vanity uttering､ they entice with carnal covetings—in wanton ways—them who are well-nigh escaping from the men who in error have their behaviour;

content: 19 Promising freedom to them､ they themselves being all the while slaves of corruption,— For by whom one hath been defeated by the same hath he become enslaved,—
content_old: 19 Promising freedom to them､ they themselves being all the while slaves of corruption,— For by whom one hath been defeated by the same hath he become enslaved,—

content: 20 For if having escaped from the defilements of the world by a personal knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ but by the same having again become entangled､ they are defeated The last state hath become､ for them､ worse than the first;
content_old: 20 For if having escaped from the defilements of the world by a personal knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ but by the same having again become entangled､ they are defeated The last state hath become､ for them､ worse than the first;

content: 21 For better had it been for them— Not to have obtained a personal knowledge of the way of righteousness, Than having obtained such knowledge to turn back out of the holy commandment delivered unto them.
content_old: 21 For better had it been for them— Not to have obtained a personal knowledge of the way of righteousness, Than having obtained such knowledge to turn back out of the holy commandment delivered unto them.

content: 1 This､ already beloved､ is the second letter I am writing unto you; And､ in these letters､ I am stirring up—by way of calling to remembrance—your uncorrupted mind､
content_old: 1 This､ already beloved､ is the second letter I am writing unto you; And､ in these letters､ I am stirring up—by way of calling to remembrance—your uncorrupted mind､

content: 2 To remember the fore-spoken declarations made by the holy prophets､ and the commandment of the Lord and Saviour by your apostles.
content_old: 2 To remember the fore-spoken declarations made by the holy prophets､ and the commandment of the Lord and Saviour by your apostles.

content: 3 Of this first taking note— That there will come､ in the last of the days､ with scoffing scoffers, After their own covetings going on､
content_old: 3 Of this first taking note— That there will come､ in the last of the days､ with scoffing scoffers, After their own covetings going on､

content: 4 and saying— Where is the promise of his presence? For since the fathers fell asleep all things thus remain､ from the beginning of creation.
content_old: 4 and saying— Where is the promise of his presence? For since the fathers fell asleep all things thus remain､ from the beginning of creation.

content: 5 For this they wilfully forget— That there were heavens from of old､ and an earth on account of water and by means of water compacted by God’s word,—
content_old: 5 For this they wilfully forget— That there were heavens from of old､ and an earth on account of water and by means of water compacted by God’s word,—

content: 6 By which means the world that then was with water being flooded perished;
content_old: 6 By which means the world that then was with water being flooded perished;

content: 7 While the heavens and the earth that now are By the same word have been stored with fire､ Being kept unto the day of judgment and destruction of the ungodly men.
content_old: 7 While the heavens and the earth that now are By the same word have been stored with fire､ Being kept unto the day of judgment and destruction of the ungodly men.

content: 8 But this one thing forget not､ beloved,— That one day､ with the Lord is as a thousand years, And a thousand years as one day.
content_old: 8 But this one thing forget not､ beloved,— That one day､ with the Lord is as a thousand years, And a thousand years as one day.

content: 9 The Lord is not slack concerning his promise､ As some count slackness; But is long-suffering with regard to you, Not being minded that any should perish､ But that all unto repentance should come.
content_old: 9 The Lord is not slack concerning his promise､ As some count slackness; But is long-suffering with regard to you, Not being minded that any should perish､ But that all unto repentance should come.

content: 10 Howbeit the day of the Lord will be here as a thief,— In which the heavens with a rushing noise will pass away, While elements becoming intensely hot will be dissolved, And earth､ and the works therein will be discovered.
content_old: 10 Howbeit the day of the Lord will be here as a thief,— In which the heavens with a rushing noise will pass away, While elements becoming intensely hot will be dissolved, And earth､ and the works therein will be discovered.

content: 11 Seeing that all these things are thus to be dissolved What manner of persons ought ye all the while to be､ in holy ways of behaviour and acts of godliness,—
content_old: 11 Seeing that all these things are thus to be dissolved What manner of persons ought ye all the while to be､ in holy ways of behaviour and acts of godliness,—

content: 12 Expecting and hastening the presence of the day of God, By reason of which, heavens being on fire will be dissolved､ And elements becoming intensely hot are to be melted;
content_old: 12 Expecting and hastening the presence of the day of God, By reason of which, heavens being on fire will be dissolved､ And elements becoming intensely hot are to be melted;

content: 13 But new heavens��� and a new earth according to his promise are we expecting, Wherein righteousness is to dwell.
content_old: 13 But new heavens��� and a new earth according to his promise are we expecting, Wherein righteousness is to dwell.

content: 14 Wherefore､ beloved､ these things expecting— Give diligence unspotted and unblemished by him to be found in peace;
content_old: 14 Wherefore､ beloved､ these things expecting— Give diligence unspotted and unblemished by him to be found in peace;

content: 15 And account our Lord’s long suffering to be salvation:— Even as our beloved brother Paul also According to the wisdom given unto him Hath written unto you;
content_old: 15 And account our Lord’s long suffering to be salvation:— Even as our beloved brother Paul also According to the wisdom given unto him Hath written unto you;

content: 16 As also in all letters speaking in them concerning these things,— In which letters are some things hard to be understood, Which the uninstructed and unstable wrest,—as also the other scriptures,—unto their own destruction.
content_old: 16 As also in all letters speaking in them concerning these things,— In which letters are some things hard to be understood, Which the uninstructed and unstable wrest,—as also the other scriptures,—unto their own destruction.

content: 17 Ye therefore, beloved, Taking note beforehand Be on your guard､ lest with the error of the impious being led away ye fall from your own steadfastness;
content_old: 17 Ye therefore, beloved, Taking note beforehand Be on your guard､ lest with the error of the impious being led away ye fall from your own steadfastness;
